verses.text: PEA hoko ‘a e folofola ‘a Sihova kiate au, ‘o pehē,

Hako‘i-tangata, ko ho‘o nofo ‘oku fai ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e fāmili pau‘u, ‘a ia ‘oku nau ma‘u mata ke sio ‘aki, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te nau sio, ‘oku nau ma‘u telinga ke fanongo ‘aki, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ongo‘i; he ko e fāmili pau‘u ena.

Siini, Hako‘i-tangata, ke ke tokonaki ma‘au ‘a e me‘a ki he ‘alu ‘i he fakahē, pea ke fai ‘aho ho‘o tuku atu hangē ha fakahē, ke nau sio ki ai; ‘io, ke ke hiki mei ho potu na ki ha potu kehe, ‘oku nau sio ki ai: hei‘ilo te nau tokanga nai, he ko e fāmili pau‘u ‘ena.
‘Io, ‘ave ki tu‘a ho‘o tokonaki, ‘aho, ke nau sio ki ai, ko e tokonaki tofu pē ‘o ha ‘alu pōpula: ka ke toki ‘alu pē koe, efiafi, ka ‘oku nau sio ki ai, ko e hū kitu‘a tofu pē ‘a ha ‘alu pōpula.
Lolotonga ‘enau sio ki ai, ke ke foa hao ava ‘i he holisi, pea ke ‘ave me‘a kitu‘a ai.
Lolotonga ‘enau sio ki ai, ke ke hili ia ki ho uma, ‘ave kitu‘a ‘i he kaupō‘uli; fakapūlou ho mata ke ‘oua te ke sio ki he kelekele; he kuo u tuku koe ko e taipe ki he fale ‘o ‘Isileli.

Pea u fai tatau mo hoku fekau: na‘a ku ‘ave nāunau kitu‘a, ‘aho, ko e tokonaki tofu pē ‘o ha ‘alu pōpula; pea efiafi na‘a ku hanga ‘o foa ha ava ‘i he holisi; na‘a ku ‘ave me‘a kitu‘a ‘i he kaupō‘uli; na‘a ku hilifaki ki hoku uma ‘oku nau sio ki ai.
Pea pongipongi hake na‘e hoko ‘a e folofola ‘a Sihova kiate au, ‘o pehē,
Hako‘i-tangata, ‘ikai kuo fehu‘i kiate koe ‘e he fale ‘o ‘Isileli, ‘a e fāmili pau‘u na, ‘o pehē, Ko e hā ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ke fai?
Te ke tala kiate kinautolu, Ko e folofola eni ‘a ‘Ātonai Sihova: Ko e kavenga ‘eni ‘a e ‘eiki ‘i Selusalema, pea mo e fale kotoa ‘o ‘Isileli, ‘a ia ‘oku kau ki ai ‘a e fa‘ahinga ko ē.
Ke ke lea ‘o pehē, Ko homou taipe au: hangē ko ‘eku fai, ‘e pehē ‘a e fai kiate kinautolu: te nau ‘alu ‘i he fakahē, ‘i he taki pōpula.

Pea ko e ‘eiki ‘oku nofo ‘i honau lotolotonga te ne hili ki hono uma ‘i he kaupō‘uli, pea te ne ‘alu kitu‘a: te nau foa ha ava ‘i he holisi ke ‘ave ‘a e me‘a kitu‘a: te ne fakapūlou hono mata, koe‘uhi ke ‘oua te ne sio ‘e ia ki he fonua ‘aki ha fo‘i mata.
Pea te u fola hoku kupenga kiate ia, pea ‘e pō ia ‘i he‘eku hele: pea te u ‘omi ia ki Pāpilone, ki he fonua ‘o e kau Kalitia; kae ‘ikai te ne sio ki ai, pea te ne pekia ‘i he potu ko ia.
Pea ko kinautolu ‘oku takatakai kiate ia, ‘a e tākanga mo ‘ene ngaahi vāhenga tau kotoa, te u punakaki ki he matangi kotoa pē; pea te u tafi ki tu‘a niu ‘aki ‘a e heletā.
Pea te nau ‘ilo ko Sihova au, ‘oka u ka veteki kinautolu ‘i he ngaahi pule‘anga, mo punakaki ki he ngaahi fonua.

Ka te u fakahaofi hanau toenga mei he heletā mo e honge mo e mate faka‘auha, ko e tu‘unga me‘a toko si‘i; koe‘uhi ke nau ‘a‘au ‘enau ngaahi fu‘u fakalielia ‘i he ngaahi pule‘anga te nau hoko ki ai; ke nau ‘ilo ko Sihova au.
Pea na‘e hoko ‘a e folofola ‘a Sihova kiate au, ‘o pehē,
Hako‘i-tangata, te ke kai tete pē ho‘o me‘akai, pea te ke fai ho‘o inu mo e hoha‘a mo e fakamamahi.

Pea te ke pehē ki he kakai ‘o e fonua, Ko e folofola ‘eni ‘a ‘Ātonai Sihova ki he nofo Selusalema, ‘I he kelekele ‘o ‘Isileli te nau kai ‘enau me‘akai mo e hoha‘a, pea te nau fai ‘enau inu mo e ofoofo, koe‘uhi kuo mole hono mahu, pea kuo lala hono fonua, koe‘uhi ko e fakamālohi ‘a e kau nofo ai.
‘Io, fakalala ‘a e ngaahi kolo kakai, pea ‘e ka‘anga ‘a e fonua; ke mou ‘ilo ko Sihova au.
Pea hoko ‘a e folofola ‘a Sihova kiate au, ‘o pehē,
Hako‘i-tangata, ko e hā ‘a e lea ni ‘oku fakatokotokanaki ‘aki ‘iate kimoutolu, ‘o kau ki he fonua ‘o ‘Isileli, ‘o pehē; ‘Oku fakalōloa taimi, Pea kuo ikunoa ‘a e vīsone kotoa?

Ko ia ke ke tala kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Ko e folofola ‘eni ‘a ‘Ātonai Sihova: Te u ‘ai ke mate ‘a e lea ko ia, pea ‘e ‘ikai toe fakatokotokanaki ‘aki ia ‘i ‘Isileli: ka ke tala kiate kinautolu, ‘Oku ofi ‘a e taimi Mo e tala ‘a e vīsone kotoa.
He ‘ikai toe ai ha vīsone loi, mo e tongafisi fakaoleole, ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e fale ‘o ‘Isileli.
He ko Sihova au; ko au ‘e lea: ko e lea ‘oku ou fai ‘e hoko ia; ‘e ‘ikai toe toloi: he ‘i homou taimi, ‘a e fāmili pau‘u na, te u lea‘aki ha me‘a ‘o fai–ko ‘Ātonai Sihova ia mei he Ta‘ehāmai.
Pea na‘e hoko ‘a e folofola ‘a Sihova kiate au, ‘o pehē,
Hako‘i-tangata, vakai ‘oku lau ‘e he fale ‘o ‘Isileli, Tokua ko e vīsone ‘oku ne sio ki ai ko e me‘a ki ha taimi fuoloa; ‘io, ‘oku palofisai ‘a e siana ni ki he ngaahi taimi mama‘o.
Ko ia ke ke lea kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē, Ko e folofola ‘eni ‘a ‘Ātonai Sihova, ‘E ‘ikai toe toloi ‘eku ngaahi lea; ko e lea te u fai ‘e hoko–ko ‘Ātonai Sihova ia mei he Ta‘ehāmai.
